opportunities: Improve UI to prevent overlapping info boxes and enable scrolling on selection screen
Fix level design so enemies can reach all areas and avoid dead corners
Implement range upgrades in the shop to enhance ability depth
Expand roster with more characters, abilities, items, enemies, weapons, and upgrades
Introduce varied game modes (endless, staged, 1HP) and persistent meta-progression
Adjust difficulty curve to ramp more gradually in early waves
Explore alternative art themes beyond geometric shapes, like a bacterial motif

mutation_briefs.title: Fix UI Overlap and Scrolling
mutation_briefs.rationale: Addresses usability issues where info boxes block gameplay and selection screen lacks scrolling.
changes: Reposition or toggle info boxes to avoid overlapping the game area
Enable horizontal scrolling on the desktop selection screen
Ensure UI elements scale or collapse to fit various resolutions

mutation_briefs.title: Eliminate Dead Map Corners
mutation_briefs.rationale: Removes unreachable zones to ensure consistent enemy engagement and fair challenge.
changes: Adjust arena boundaries to fill or remove dead corners
Update enemy pathfinding to navigate edge cases and cover full map
Reposition spawn points to prevent unreachable areas

mutation_briefs.title: Add Range Upgrade Option
mutation_briefs.rationale: Fills missing upgrade type to deepen build variety and strategic choices.
changes: Introduce a shop option that increases projectile or ability range
Balance upgrade cost and effect relative to other upgrades
Add UI indicators showing current and upgraded range values

mutation_briefs.title: Expand Characters and Items
mutation_briefs.rationale: Addresses player desire for more content to boost engagement and replayability.
changes: Design and implement additional hero shapes with unique abilities
Add new enemy archetypes, weapon types, and item pickups
Introduce upgrade variants to diversify build paths

mutation_briefs.title: Introduce More Game Modes
mutation_briefs.rationale: Enhances replayability by offering new modes.
changes: Add endless mode and 1HP challenge variant alongside staged waves
Create UI for selecting game modes

mutation_briefs.title: Adjust Early Difficulty Curve
mutation_briefs.rationale: Smooths difficulty ramp to improve player onboarding and retention.
changes: Reduce enemy count or health in initial waves
Stagger introduction of aggressive enemy types over more time
Allow difficulty settings or tutorial assistance for first runs

mutation_briefs.title: Apply Bacterial Theme
mutation_briefs.rationale: Offers a fresh art direction to move beyond geometric POC feel and enhance thematic appeal.
changes: Replace geometric hero silhouettes with cell-like art (e.g., antibodies)
Redesign enemies as bacteria or viruses with matching visuals
Update UI color palette and sprites to reflect biological motif
